title: Why is Zoe a better assassin than Leblanc?
body:
Zoe has:
-Better CC
-Like 3x damage in full combo
-Better mobility
-3 summoner spells 
-RNG
-Better waveclear
-Lower cooldowns
And unlike Leblanc, she doesn't have to wait 6 seconds for her target to die after she lands something on them

replies.body:
Zoe doesn't have better mobility than Leblanc; the rest is pretty much true though.
(Worth noting that Zoe's main damage can be bodyblocked - by for example a tank stepping in front of a CCed squishie)

zoe only has a 42% chance (around there) to have better mobility than leblanc with how often flash drops for her.
 gg rito confirmed most broken summoner spell has such a high chance to drop. 
If she has 2 flashes she has better mobility than leblanc because she also gets a supper long movement speed buff on it. Her mobility is also better than leblanc with any 3 procs of her w flash being 1 (Zoe carrying summoner spell flash in the game).

The mobility bit is wrong. 

I realize there are ARAM clips of Zoe casting 4 Flashes in a row, but that's ridiculously situational and has no place in a comparison when LB can Dash whenever the CD is up.

For my part, i think new LB is garbage due to being a fucking assassin that has to WAIT to deal her burst. Like, what the actual fuck was being smoked when this idea was passed.

LB DEFINITELY needed to lose the silence and likely needed a bit less damage. But this abomination is garbage. FFS AD LeBlanc is gaining traction bc that's preferable to AP LB LOL.
Hey I have been playing some AD Leblanc before her rework, but couldn't get AD leblanc to work after it, where have you heard of ad Leblanc?

Hey.

God forbid if people can't ask questions to each other anymore because there's google. No one asked you to come in.

Yes I'm actually aware google exists. Of course a person who already knows the answer is much more likely to give you helpful information. No, google doesn't have the answer to everything, and it doesn't help here.

I asked nicely, if you aren't going to try to help the best you can do is be nice as well. By the way it's season 8 now.
Calm down.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N95YSoWCrq0&feature=youtu.be

Yea, her R can't be used to run away.
Except it is on short cooldown, synced well with her sleep.

Not the best clip. But real game, not ARAM. Not abusing flash. Just literally able to run around and annoy people.
She is not the most mobile champ. But she defintely has more mobility than say Garen.

All assassins got their burst delayed because people were tired of 100-0 oneshots.
Problems exist with both cases:
When assassins 100-0 in the blink of an eye, they feel satisfied but targets feel there wasn't counterplay
When assassins have a delayed 100-0, they can't reliably assassinate targets and feel worse, while targets feel that there's more counterplay.

I know, you're right. 

It's my opinion the main problem is how EASY the 100-0 comes. Too often it comes from point and click, or -guaranteed- setup. I think delayed burst on a class whose only purpose is removing a key player from the enemy team is poor, full stop. It's like suggesting every tank HAS to wait 2s for their defensive steroids to activate. 

I think Talon's assassinations are comparatively healthy. His kill condition is his bleed, which you CAN trigger almost instantly, but because it is a DoT it is ALSO possible for you to be shielded or healed to survival, but by then Talon did his job, so to speak. Contrast to LB, whose assassination actually literally requires she wait to even trigger it and it can be denied by actually just walking away unless she used her E, but then she has to aim and hit you AND still wait for her main damage tool to proc? I think this would be much healthier if she didn't need to wait to proc her sigil, but her sigil explosion itself would be delayed, but LB would get in and get out. From there, the target dies if alone without healing or shielding or if not, their support saves them, as they are intended to. Why not give LB passive a Living Bomb (WoW) type of mechanic where her Q marks her target and if the target is hit with another spell (conditional) then the sigil pops, erupting for a certain amount of damage after 1s. Maybe her ult Q becomes a skillshot nuke that deals more damage than it currently does but it requires aiming, so you can't just QRQ to nuke someone point and click.

I appreciate the whole "don't wanna step on other character niches" but i don't know how many healthy ways to implement assassinations that don't feel bad to execute exist that are ALSO unique and fresh, to be blunt.

I don't think you should have TIME to REACT to an assassin. That's -literally- the point of an assassin. I 100% think ALL assassin burst should be avoidable to some extent that is not solely range. If your counterplay is don't be in 700 units of me if i am on my power curve (Akali.....), you are a poorly balanced assassin.

Kat is a perfect example too. She does wayyy too much damage with electrocute rn, but you are not killing shit as Kat with only her targetted Q and E, point and click or not, because her burst is tied to her daggers. Conditional. You CAN avoid the bulk of her intended burst, just right now Electrocute and the preseason are out of control.

In what world does Zoe have better mobility than Leblanc?  

An LB full combo also does way more damage and is easier to hit with.

Well she's a better version of LB minus the mobility. She also actually has a late game unlike LB. LeBlanc really needs her mini update in 2018 to define her better. She's either too oppressive or too clunky cause she has to be delayed for 1.5s which can prove to be a lot in late game where her damage doesn't back her up enough for how much she has to wait for it. I really did enjoy her assassin update but after all the nerfs (which were justified) she feels too clunky to play as. 
Hopefully 2018 treats her better.

That's still more mid game oriented than late game. You're never gonna be in a position where you'll have enough time to fully proc it without dying.
She needs better scaling in a sense that her delays become smaller as the game goes on. Similarly in a way that Katarina works. While she has to wait for her daggers in the meantime she can use her R to fill out the necessary damage. Relying on gimmicks from items is really shit.

*  I am ex #1 lb world nothing I do is incorrect or gimmicky with her (atm #20 LB world) 
*  You are supposed to use your R to stall out for passive (I dont need passive for squishies though), Or exit for some time and get back..

what's broken about her is
- her E being hit from the jungle from somewhere you have no idea how to ward it , and then coming with her q to kill you 
her ult is surely her weakness , at least when you are playing a mage , you have a 100% guarantee where to hit your skill shots when she uses her ult 
- what makes her annoying lately is that no one tried to dodge her q which is one of the easiest skillshots to dodge unless you are sleeping in her bubble , and no one tried to tank her q when you are hit by her E , and if they do , they might be close to you which makes her q hit you both and that's the problem we're suffering from  right now

She isn't as freely mobile as LB> But she isn't some stationary rock. And it isn't as simple as 'oh Ult makes her vulnerable.'

Zoe is more glass cannon because she has less escapes, and, when she commits and doesn't kill her target, she's more vulnerable than LB. 

More dmg for less safety.

What mitigates this is her rng W.
If you think Zoe has better mobility you are sadly mistaken.

What Le blanc has over her
- By far highest pick potentional in game. As long as you are 1500 range away from me I can kill you (Yes most le blanc players cant) 
- Zoe can somewhat do the above but needs walls
- Adaptability. Only other champion who has that is like ryze
- Harder to focus due to R>ability
- Global presence (can save a wave entering tower with this even)
- Insane safety even when dashing inside 5 to one shot someone
- Higher mobility by a mile
- Highest singletargeted burst in a game. Q,R(Q) double lichbane proc, double revolver proc,
